function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"SARS-CoV-2 aerosol stability","Impact":"Potential for prolonged exposure and transmission through aerosols","Mitigation":"Enhanced ventilation systems, air purification, and use of personal protective equipment","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, UV germicidal irradiation, and negative pressure rooms","People":"Healthcare workers, public in enclosed spaces","Owner":"Health organizations, building owners, and facility managers"},{"Description":"Surface stability of SARS-CoV-2 on plastic and steel","Impact":"Prolonged contamination and potential for fomite transmission","Mitigation":"Frequent disinfection, use of antimicrobial surfaces, and hand hygiene","Technologies":"Antimicrobial coatings, electrostatic disinfection, and UV-C disinfection","People":"Individuals in public areas, healthcare workers","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Comparison of SARS-CoV-2 with SARS-CoV-1","Impact":"Understanding viral comparative behavior for effective preventive measures","Mitigation":"Research on implications for public health, vaccine development, and infection control strategies","Technologies":"Genomic sequencing, bioinformatics, and epidemiological modeling","People":"Public health researchers, epidemiologists, and healthcare professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies, and healthcare organizations"}]}
